abstract: New books that examine the rise of the American oligarchy, the decline of moderate Republicans and the Tea Party's core beliefs about government
lead_paragraph: In this Sunday's Book Review, three new books are reviewed that respectively examine the rise of the American oligarchy, the decline of moderate Republicans and the Tea Party's core beliefs about government.
